post.body: oh no! Hope you feel better too!
thanks, ejt!
ooh, good luck w/ that. hope they don't find any "left lung abnormalities" like they did w/ mine. takes days to get ct sched.
I wanted to recess to the Indiana jones theme, but my mom/wedding planner wouldn't let me. Perhaps I could live vicariously?
omg we have the EXACT same fireplace and kitchen 1/2-wall and they're painted the exact same color! give H a kiss for me!
she looks cold. you should get her some coffee. happy anniversary, you crazy kids!
my sentiments exactly!
do you have one? does it actually work? my mom calls it the "ShamScam"
it WAS very good! i'll freeze some for you ;)
like father, like sons! A-ha-ha!
glad to hear you're feeling better, especially since i'm finishing your march issue tomorrow! sorry you missed christmas #5!
haha, thank you. i do try!
my sophomore year roommate has gotten me hooked on that! it's great! what do you put on yours?
mikes cousin saw it yesterday and we're going to see it w/ her tomorrow. She says it's that good.
Just missed 3 light rotations cuz the lady in front wasn't pulled up far enough to trip the sensors. Some ppl are just clueless.
walmart brand nyquill is gift from God. cough-less sleep ='s major work progress this morning. maybe i will have christmas vaca after all!
"i'm trying to achieve detante w/ the cat." -my husband
http://twitpic.com/ts9x - My kitchen wall, as of 1030 tonight. A childhood dream come true, thanks to my husband's paint skills and matt ...
Kids are crazy today. Must be some big holiday coming up or something.
Watching my cats stalk each other. One can seriously jump and hang midair a la matrix. Really need to get that on video.
PSA: tylenol cough & sore throat has more cough suppresant than all over-the-counter cough syrups (spent 20 min reading labels) & it ROCKS!
reviewing my curriculum as i pray for my precious little 2nd grade group! also praying for patience as i listen to endless elf stories!
garrett and harper asleep...time to do some work!
and thus beginneth the end of football season. it's a football-less saturday. i'm going into mourning.
resenting the itchy lungs. wanted to ride today.
in starbucks trying to endure the music they're playing: someone w/ an airy voice singing "winter wonderland" in a minor key. blech!
just watched the kids' christmas program. couldn't stop smiling and giggling at the kids. they were so freakin cute! especially @fohdave's.
Horrendous morning made better by rocking a certain 2-year-old to sleep this afternoon!
just bought 99 beethoven recordings for 1.99. i love amazon.
http://twitpic.com/xs4l - I experimented and it worked! Chinese beef fried rice! My ye ye would be proud!
http://twitpic.com/xpox - Like a child, my dog has his toys with him when he sleeps. How cute is that?
adding this to my list of things football announcers should refrain from saying: "squirts through the middle."
playoffs, baby!
being spontaneous w/ my hubby. staying up late to rent/watch movies since there's no church tomorrow!
Seeing Benjamin button. A little nervous about its length. I have the attention span of a 4-year-old.
working on the saturday after christmas. no complaints, though; so thankful to God to have work to do, unlike nearly 9% of the US
http://twitpic.com/wtmk - Playing operation with my cousins.
http://twitpic.com/wqy3 - On our way to granny and granddaddy's for his birthday. We've worn Dooley out this week.
Just saw marley and me. The book is the reason we have Dooley! Great book great movie.
http://twitpic.com/wimj - Passed out from my first-ever Christmas dinner of prime rib!
